fall.synopsis: Short special about Gold Saints, included on DVDs of Saint Seiya: Meiou Hades Meikai-hen series.

titles.title: Minna no Uta: Boku wa Kuma

fall.title: Boku wa Kuma
title_synonyms: Minna no Uta: Boku wa Kuma
fall.synopsis: A stop motion animation produced by NHK. A colorful children's music video about a clumsy bear, what he is—and is not—and what he likes and dislikes.

fall.title: Yomigaeru Sora Pilot
fall.synopsis:
Yomigaeru Sora was initially supposed to have a female protagonist with sharper animation. Due to Yuji Matsukura (J.C.Staff Executive Officer, Head of Production), Katsushi Sakurabi (Director), and Fumihiko Takayama (Series Composition) outvoting Kiyoshi Sugiyama (Producer), the story was changed to have a male protagonist with simpler animation.

Sakurabi's original idea for the anime was made into pilot and the pilot was included with the 7th volume of the Limited Edition DVD Box Set.

titles.title: Artificial Insect KABUTO BORG Victory by Victory
人造昆虫カブトボーグ V×V

fall.title: Jinzou Konchuu Kabutoborg VxV
fall.title_japanese: 人造昆虫カブトボーグ V×V
title_synonyms: Artificial Insect KABUTO BORG Victory by Victory
fall.synopsis: BorgBattles between KabutoBorgs have become popular enough to hold world tournaments. The main character Ryuusei is an enthusiast of these battles. Along with his friends Katsuji and Ken, he continues fighting against new enemies day after day.

fall.title: Atagoal wa Neko no Mori
fall.synopsis: Today is the Atagoal town carnival. Talking cats and human townsfolk are having a ball. Enjoying the party to the fullest is our hero, Hideyoshi, a big fat cat, who is always involved in any trouble going on in the town.

fall.title: Mission School
fall.synopsis:
An animated music video for the song "MISSION SCHOOL" by MOKA☆.

The video was released on a limited edition DVD sold with their 2nd and 4th album.

fall.title: Zhong Hua Xiao Zi
fall.synopsis:
Set in the Henan Province of China during the 17th century, three teenagers are sent to a Shaolin Temple to learn the style of Kung Fu against a ruthless Demon, not seen since the Sui Dynasty, who terrorizes the province in order to search for two magic books to create more power and being stronger in world domination.

(Source: Wikipedia)

fall.title: Mukidashi no Mitsuko
fall.synopsis: Mitsuko-san is being bothered by her mother when she is teleported to a beautiful mountainous view to show her freedom.

titles.title: サルゲッチュ ～オンエアー～2nd

fall.title: Saru Getchu: On Air 2nd
fall.title_japanese: サルゲッチュ ～オンエアー～2nd
fall.synopsis: Saru Getchu: On Air sequel.

fall.title: Funny Pets 2nd Season
fall.synopsis: The story continues where it was left off from in the first season as Crescent and Corona continue bickering over Funny.

titles.title: こま撮りえいが こまねこ

fall.title: Komadori Movie: Komaneko
fall.title_japanese: こま撮りえいが こまねこ
fall.synopsis: Komaneko is the story of a very curious cat, named Koma-chan, that attempts to make her own stop motion. She deals with many challenges, but she also made some friends while creating her movie. Her curiosity makes her even more friends.

titles.title: 祝! (ハピ☆ラキ)ビックリマン

fall.title: Happy☆Lucky Bikkuriman
fall.title_japanese: 祝! (ハピ☆ラキ)ビックリマン
fall.synopsis:
Continuation of the Bikkuriman Series.

Genki Seihikari and his friends join the adventure in order to save seven gods of the White Galaxy.

titles.title: ぷるるんっ！しずくちゃん

fall.title: Pururun! Shizuku-chan
fall.title_japanese: ぷるるんっ！しずくちゃん
fall.synopsis:
The series revolves around a playful young child named Shizuku-Chan. He, alongside his schoolmates, friends, and family lives a life of dangerous adventures in the Shizuku Forest.

(Source: Wikipedia)

fall.title: Ukkari Pénélope
fall.synopsis:
Meet Penelope, the absent-minded young koala. Rarely seen without Deudeu – her favourite stuffed rabbit – Penelope likes nothing more than finding another adventure in the most unlikely of places. A simple gust of wind blowing her hat away can lead to Penelope running her own stall atop a tree stump where she trades flowers for apples, and paper planes for acorns. From games of hide and seek with her friends, to playing with the bubbles in the bath or counting sheep during nap time, Penelope’s life is never dull – even if she does wear odd socks when she gets herself dressed in the morning.

(Source: Anime-Planet)
fall.background: Winner of the Excellence Award on the 11th Japan Media Arts Festival.

titles.title: ウサハナ 夢見るバレリーナ

fall.title: Usahana: Yumemiru Ballerina
fall.title_japanese: ウサハナ 夢見るバレリーナ
fall.synopsis:
Based on a Sanrio product.

Hana is a sweet rabbit with a passion for ballet. She is admitted to an important ballet academy in Etoile Island.
fall.background: Short anime aired inside the anime corner of the Kitty's Paradise TV block.

fall.title: Nekko-kun
fall.synopsis: A cute clip for Minna no Uta. It is about a tree named Nekko-kun and about his life.

titles.title: Kerokero Keroppi: Hasunoue Town Kiki Ippatsu!
けろけろけろっぴ はすのうえタウン危機一髪!

fall.title: Kerokero Keroppi: Hasunoue Town Kiki Ippatsu!
fall.title_japanese: けろけろけろっぴ はすのうえタウン危機一髪!
fall.background: Short anime aired inside the anime corner of the Kitty's Paradise TV block.

fall.title: RGB Adventure
fall.synopsis:
The light – it is the resource of life. There are mysterious monsters and robots that aim at the powers of the light, i.e. R(Red), G(Green), and B(Blue). However, no one notices that… except three children.

Ryu - he is a stupid, simple, and mischievous boy who he says without hesitation that his dream is to the conqueror of the world. 
Guccho - he is a nerd of mechanics, glutton, and chicken-hearted.
Becky - she is very cute, but she has a very twisted personality.

They have encouraging friends, such as Rosso, Gibson, Bo, etc. They are various aliens that usually change their figures into animals. By exchanges between aliens who have different principles, purposes, tastes, and hobbies, they will learn importance of communications.

(Source: AnimeNfo)

fall.synopsis: Direct continuation of the second season. Also labeled as episode 26-35.

fall.title: Ohanashi no Hana
fall.synopsis: Short film by Amika Kubo and Seita Inoue, creatively animating a conversation between three people as they talk about traveling.
fall.background: The film is the recipient of numerous awards, including an excellence award at the 10th Japan Media Arts Festival in 2006.

fall.title: Kkurukkuru-wa Chingu-deul
fall.synopsis:
The story is set in a village called Green Forest Village, where is inhabited by friendly animals. The story were focused on 5 special animal friends whose friendship binds them together, Koori: A brown Raccoon boy and an aspiring inventor, Pinpin: A blue and white Giant Panda boy and a warm hearted artist, Lalla: a pink Tabby cat girl and an aspiring musician who wishes to be a princess, Toto: a purple Bat boy who wants to be a pilot and fly and lastly; Curucuru, a Brown bear boy who likes to cook. All of them venture through several adventures in the forest and town, making exciting and marvelous stories and also getting in and out of trouble as they learn valuable lessons in life and things around them.

(Source: Wikipedia)

titles.title: Chibi Neko Chobi/Chibi Neko Kobi to Tomodachi
ちびねこチョビ／ちびねこコビとおともだち

fall.title: Chibi Neko Chobi/Chibi Neko Kobi to Tomodachi
fall.title_japanese: ちびねこチョビ／ちびねこコビとおともだち
fall.synopsis:
A double feature based on a best-selling children's book by Sumino Eiko (author of Kiki's Delivery Service).

Chibi Neko Chobi is about Chobi running away from home after getting scolded.

Chibi Neko Kobi to Tomodachi is about Chobi as an adult and now has given birth to her own litter of 4 kittens. The youngest is a boy named Kobi and due to his own mischief he ends up separated from his family.

titles.title: Watashi to Kotori to Suzu to
A Bell, a Bird and Me

fall.title: Watashi to Kotori to Suzu to
fall.title_english: A Bell, a Bird and Me
fall.synopsis: The poem Watashi to Kotori to Suzu to was originally written by Misuzu Kaneko. Composer Ryuichi Sugimoto converted the poem into a song and it was sung by Aragaki Tsutomu. This song was animated for NHK's Minna no Uta program.

titles.title: おれたち, ともだち!

fall.title: Oretachi, Tomodachi!
fall.title_japanese: おれたち, ともだち!
fall.synopsis: Based on the children's picture book of the same name by Uchida Rintaro (Story) and Nana Furuya (Illustrations).

fall.title: Tsuki
fall.synopsis: Music video for the song Tsuki by YOU ni Mitsuru, a collaborative group formed by YOU (Yukiko Ehara) and Mitsuru Kuramoto in 2006, that was featured on NHK's Minna no Uta program. That same month, the video was released on a two-disc DVD produced by Pony Canyon under the same name, along with the full-length version of the song, lyric videos, and other supplemental information.

fall.title: Charmmy Kitty
fall.synopsis:
Three OVA works of the new Sanrio character Charmy Kitty which was born in 2004, the 30th anniversary of Hello Kitty's birth!!

Each OVA contains 4-5 short stories.

(Source: cdjapan)

fall.title: Kungya Kungya
fall.synopsis:
Kyungyas, from vegetable kingdom, comes to the Kyungya Restaurant. 
They have a mission to make children eat more vegetable and protect them from greasy, instant dishes. However, far from completing their mission, Kyungyas have hard time keeping the restaurant from bankruptcy. It is because of Onion Kyungya’s experimental dishes. His curiosity makes trouble with Celery Kyungya, the manager of Kyungya restaurant. 
How can they solve the problems they have with the customers. Would it be possible for Kyungyas to accomplish the mission?

(Source: KBS Media)
